text: Pfäffikon is the capital of the district Pfäffikon in the canton of Zurich in Switzerland. ==Villages== Auslikon, Ober Balm, Unter Balm, Bussenhausen, Irgenhausen, Oberwil, Sulzberg, Hermatswil, Schür, Wallikon, Rick, Ravensbühl, Faichrüti and Rutschberg. ==Gallery== File:Pfäffikersee - Rutschberg - Pfäffikon IMG 3606.jpg|View of Pfäffikon and Pfäffikersee as seen from Rutschberg File:Seegräben - Pfäffikersee - Auslikon Strandbad IMG 3628.JPG|View of Auslikon as seen from Seegräben File:Pfäffikon-Irgenhausen IMG 3410.jpg|Irgenhausen File:Pfäffikersee - Rutschberg IMG 3609.jpg|Rutschberg ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * Category:Municipalities in Pfäffikon Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Pfäffikon, Zürich
